data.title: Jennifer Lopez's ex-husband Marc Anthony just got married again
data.meta_description: Jennifer Lopez's ex-husband Marc Anthony just got married again.
data.text:
The 54-year-old singer tied the knot with 23-year-old model Nadia Ferreira at the Perez Art Museum in Miami, "Hola!" magazine reported.

Several celebrities were in attendance, including power couple David and Victoria Beckham, actress Salma Hayek ("Eternals"), actor Lin Manuel Miranda ("Hamilton"), and singer Maluma, who was also Jennifer Lopez's co-star in the movie, "Marry Me."

Ferreira's gown was designed by Galia Lahav while the groom wore Christian Dior.

Anthony's two sons with Dayanara Torres, Cristian and Ryan, were also present.

It was not immediately clear if his children with Jennifer Lopez, Emme and Max, and his two kids with another ex Debbie Rosado, Arianna and Chase, were at the wedding.

According to the Daily Mail, this is Marc Anthony's fourth marriage.
